doc.title: Babanin evlatlari
doc.plot: Married unhappily with dozens of children, the cashier Cafer embezzles a high sum of money and is put into prison. In order to learn the whereabouts of the money the rogues Mehmet, Omer and Ali become succeed in becoming his Companions in the jail. The mob leader Besir, is after the money too. To mislead them, Cafer tells wrong addresses to everybody. He gets out of the prison, takes all the money to himself. But just when he is about to leave country, he is topped by his wife and twenty-three children. Ali, who turns out to be a policeman in disguise, arrests them all. And there is a surprise awaiting them in the prison..
